visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title and labels, with a font size of 14px for the title and 12px for the labels, Data series: The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart displaying monthly average temperatures. The chart title is styled with a dark blue color and a font size of 14px, while the axis labels and titles are styled with the same dark blue color and a font size of 12px. The data series includes monthly temperature data, and the series color is set to a gradient from light blue to dark blue. The chart background is set to a light gray color, and the legend is positioned at the bottom center of the chart. Additionally, the chart margins are set to 50 pixels on all sides to ensure adequate spacing around the chart elements.
